AdminClinicSettings.timezoneDescription: Determines the clinic's operational 'day' for stats/reminders.
AdminClinicSettings.activeStatusDescription: Toggle to enable or disable this clinic
AdminClinicSettings.canSendRemindersDescription: This is a system-level toggle that overrides the reminder limit setting. If disabled, the clinic cannot send any reminders regardless of the limit set below.
AdminClinicSettings.enterReminderLimit: Enter limit (-1 for unlimited, 0 to disable)
AdminClinicSettings.reminderLimitDescription: Set to -1 for unlimited reminders, 0 to disable reminders, or enter a numeric limit per cycle. Note: This setting only applies if "Can Send Reminders" is enabled above.
AdminClinicSettings.cycleInfoDescription: This information is updated automatically at the beginning of each subscription cycle.

AdminCreateClinic.activeStatusDescription: Enable to activate this clinic immediately
AdminCreateClinic.enableRemindersDescription: Allow this clinic to send automated reminders

AdminCreateUser.emailDescription: This email will be used for login
AdminCreateUser.clinicAssignmentDescription: The user will be assigned to this clinic as a staff member

AdminEditUser.newPasswordPlaceholder: Leave blank to keep current password
AdminEditUser.passwordDescription: Minimum 8 characters. Enter only if you want to change the password.
AdminEditUser.adminClinicDescription: Platform Admins can operate without a clinic
AdminEditUser.staffClinicDescription: Clinic Admins and Staff must belong to a clinic
AdminEditUser.activeStatusDescription: Inactive users cannot login to the system
